entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
